StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>It feels as if the Upheaval made
everything worse. <sp:5:0:0>Every day, I hear
disturbing stories from travelers.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>At the stable, for instance, someone
mentioned that a giant monster has
settled down in the forest east of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Isn't that horrible?
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know Fort Hateno to the east?<sp:5:0:0>
It's abandoned now, but it was once
the site of a great battle.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Well, I say "abandoned." Sounds like
some monsters are camped out there.
You might want to stay away.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh... Thank you for assisting me.<sp:5:0:0> I just
wish you hadn't seen that.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I don't see any monsters around.<sp:5:0:0> But to
survive out in the wild, you always have
to be on your toes.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Notice>I'm not catching my breath. I'm looking
around for monsters.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>You must be ready to flee the moment a
monster appears. <sp:5:0:0>That's the only way to
survive out here.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Take the road east, past the ruins of
Fort Hateno, to reach Hateno Village.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Fort Hateno was once the site of an
enormous battle. Now it's basically a
five-star monster hotel.
The farther you are from that place,
the better.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I just hope those rumors about a
monster-control crew being assembled
turn out to be true.
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Did you hear?


There's a monster-control crew here to
take care of the monsters at Fort Hateno.<sp:5:1:0>
Really calling in the cavalry.
I would love to join a monster-control
crew—fight some monsters, give help to
those who need it.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Alas, I don't know the first thing about
weapons or tactics.

I should learn how to defend myself
before I think about protecting others...
GoalPoint_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>So, the monsters at Fort Hateno are
battling against a monster-control crew...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I wish I could help. But I really
know nothing about combat.
GoalPoint_01_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Did you hear?


A monster-control crew came and
defeated the monsters at Fort Hateno.<sp:5:1:0>
Wiped them out!
I would love to join a monster-control
crew—fight some monsters, and give help
to those who need it.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Alas, I don't know the first thing about
weapons or tactics.

I should learn how to defend myself
before I think about protecting others...
GoalPoint_01_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>A monster-control crew defeated
those monsters, thankfully. <sp:5:0:0>I should
probably be celebrating.
Instead, I find myself wishing that I could
have helped.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those...<sp:5:0:0>machines like to lurk around
south of the road.<sp:5:0:0>

I just started seeing them after the
Upheaval. As soon as they catch sight
of you, they attack!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I should really find a safer place to
walk around...
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Somebody told me that a monster of
great size has settled down in the forest
east of here. How unnerving.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>You beat them?<sp:5:0:0> For a voe, you're
certainly quite skilled.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>I'm alive? I'm alive!


<sp:3:0:2:0001>You saved me...<sp:5:0:0> Sarqso.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><sp:5:0:0>Thanks be to you. Sarqso.<sp:5:1:0> And please,
take this.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Phew! Sa'oten. <sp:5:0:0>The cads caught me 
off guard, or I would have been fine.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Up ahead lie the ruins of Fort Hateno.
You might have heard that monsters have
amassed there.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> You saved me.<sp:5:1:0> Clearly I paid the price
for letting my guard down.
GoRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>The ruins of Fort Hateno are up ahead.
That was the site of a great battle.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Monsters have gathered there, and the
monster-control crew has engaged them.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You strike me as a voe in need of
directions. Looking for Hateno?

If you head east on the road, you'll reach
the ruins of Fort Hateno. And just beyond
there, Hateno Village.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It seemed like a lazy, laid-back hamlet
when last I was there. <sp:5:0:0>But I hear things
have really livened up.
GoRange_02_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Up ahead lie the ruins of Fort Hateno.
The monster-control crew already went
out to fight the monsters amassing there.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>More than once, monsters have snuck up
on me in the rain... <sp:5:0:0>Terrifying.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>That's why if you ask me, rain is the bane
of every traveler's existence.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>The ruins of Fort Hateno are up ahead.
That was the site of a great battle.

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive>I heard a rumor that monsters are
gathering there. But if you just go to look
around, you'll be fine...<sp:5:0:0>probably.
GoRange_02_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>The ruins of Fort Hateno are up ahead.
That was the site of a great battle.

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>I hear the monster-control crew cleared
out the monsters there, but still.<sp:5:0:0> They
could always come back.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I hate the rain. Truly I do.


Rain limits your vision, making it easier for
monsters to sneak up.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I should go back home to
the Gerudo Desert. It never rained there.
GoRange_02_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Up ahead lie the ruins of Fort Hateno.
The monster-control crew cleared out the
monsters, but still. <sp:5:0:0>Stay on guard.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Cross the bridge and take the road north
to get to Kakariko Village. I hear some
unusual ruins fell from the sky there.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>To get there, you can just cross the
bridge and follow the road north.

<snd:TalkPositive>Everyone is abuzz about the ruins that
fell from the sky and landed there. I hear
they're highly unusual.
BackRange_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>You weren't asking for directions?
Apologies—<sp:5:0:0>you looked kind of lost.
AssassinClothes: That look is in bad taste.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's not just more monsters around since
the Upheaval. There are also strange
machines out and about.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The way they attack... It's almost as if
they're protecting something.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>And they like to lurk south of the road,
so I should really get out of here...
